prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Piano, Guitar, but without Chromatic Percussion.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Piano, Bass, and Drums are all featured in this song, but without Chromatic Percussion.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, but Chromatic Percussion is absent.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, omitting Chromatic Percussion.
